desc: Assisting with various tasks for the Psychology Department. Gained trust from supervisor by performing daily tasks without being asked to, and completing those tasks quickly and to a high standard.

Quickly learned to use, with no prior experience, Hive and HBase to analyze logs from users accessing the Dish Anywhere website. Learned how to efficiently look at millions of rows of logs and wrote custom Map-Reduce jobs to extract useful information.Gained experience with database design and management.

Helped to design and implement a system in Python to automatically deploy, execute, and collect data from benchmarks running on infrastructure clouds. Built off of previous studentsâ€™ work and worked with graduate students and faculty.
